Package fr.pantheonsorbonne.miage

Interface Facade

All Known Subinterfaces:
HostFacade, PlayerFacade
All Known Implementing Classes:
FacadeImpl
public interface Facade
This is the main entry point for multiplayer game.

The facade is a singleton, that should be retreived using the .getFacade() method. Since an asynchrous initialization is required, user should use the waitReady() method before using any other facacde method

    • receiveGameCommand

      GameCommand receiveGameCommand(Game game)
      Block until we receive a command.

      We will not receive commands that are not for us, only command sent to all players or to just us

      Parameters:
      game - the game from which we want to retreive the command
      Returns:
      the command sent by another player

    • sendGameCommandToAll

      Sends a command to other players in this game
      Parameters:
      game - the game to which we want to send the command
      command - the command to send
